page.title: 03Employment of local people
page.content: We have completed a survey of the jobs done by the parents of seventy families.We found out that most of the women work in our area and most of the men work outside it. Many of the women are house wives or fruit pickers.Fruit picking is a seasonal job the women can do close to home. The men seem to do all different jobs,building being the most popular. CHART OF JOBS JOB DAD MUM TOTAL HOUSE WIFE 0 23 23 FRUIT PICKERS 1 12 13 BUILDER 5 0 5 COLLEGE 2 2 4 FIBRE GLASS 3 1 4 PUB 1 2 3 MECHANIC 3 0 3 BUS PERSON 1 2 3
